summary: An intimate look at Pearl Jam's live performances and behind-the-scenes footage from their tour in Italy in September 2006.
cast: Eddie Vedder|Mike McCready|Stone Gossard|Jeff Ament|Matt Cameron|Kenneth 'Boom' Gaspar|Jill Vedder|Olivia Vedder
title: Pearl Jam: Immagine in Cornice - Live in Italy 2006
